message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in quality and innovation. Given its unique features and the value it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $15000 to the right person. Considering the exceptional benefits it provides, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a premium rate. I trust you'll find its value far exceeding this price. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
